Text: I love you, downloading it now. Are you going to start using .mp4 files with Ben 10: Omniverse? Most other uploaders made the switch to .mp4. .avi is ancient.
Also, I don't see the point in the cutting at the top/bottom you did. But okay.
Can somebody PLEASE explain magnet links to me as I can't get it to work and my kid is demanding Ben lol Thanks in advance :D
Download latest utorrent, press "Get this torrent" then click OK when your browser asks you. That's how magnet links work.

I've being downloading pretty much all of your Ben 10 episodes from the start and have never showed my appreciation to you so here it is, thank you! You are an amazing uploader, always on time and with a nice amount of seeders to go with it. You're awesome, and thank you again :)
